alert.note: Alert for Kanawha; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:23PM EDT until July 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kanawha County in central West Virginia... Central Putnam County in western West Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tornado, or near Nitro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Winfield, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Sissonville, Poca, Cross Lanes, Institute, Tornado, Teays Valley, Alum Creek and Bancroft. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 100 and 102, and between mile markers 104 and 112. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 38 and 57. Route 119 between mile markers 72 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
